meanings.def: involving the use of skill and the imagination to produce something new or a work of art
examples: a course on creative writing (= writing stories, plays and poems)
creative thinking (= thinking about problems in a new way or thinking of new ideas)
She channels her creative energy into her art.
creative with something (informal) You can get creative with this recipe and add whatever fruit you like.
They use creative ways to market their services to customers.
Get those creative juices flowing to think of new ways to serve your customers.
Most of his creative work has been done in the theatre.

meanings.def: having the skill and ability to produce something new, especially a work of art; showing this ability
examples: She's very creative—she writes poetry and paints.
Do you have any ideas? You're the creative one.

meanings.def: a person whose job involves creative work
examples: The exhibition features the paintings of local creatives.
We need to produce better creative if we want to attract big clients.
